author: wouf
body:
#### PR description:

This is a fix for the issue with random number generators in the Pythia6 library, discussed in #48814 

####  If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

We also need backports to CMSSW_15_0_X,  and CMSSW_15_1_X
title: HI GENs fix for rnd seed issue #48814
